MIME element (text/plain) 
Notice of Infringement and Declaration 
 
TO:  
Adam Pedersen 
2175 Aborn Rd #129 
San Jose, California 95121 
United States 
sales@easysiteforme.com 
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.  
1333 North Stemmons Freeway 
Suite 110 
Dallas, TX 75207 
copyright@theplanet.com 
 
ATTN :: Andrea Z. Almeida 
The website below appears to be running a pirated copy of the content
and 
backend PHP code which is owned by UrbanWars.net. Links and content 
referencing UrbanWars.net still remains in the code and throughout the 
website. 
 
REGARDING: http://pimpin4life.com 
 
IMMEDIATELY REMOVE ALL LINKS, REFERENCES, AND CONTENT ASSOCIATED WITH 
URBANWARS.NET's WEBSITE: 
http://pimpin4life.com 
 
If you do not comply with this demand immediately, we will seek whatever

remedies are available to us under the United States Copyright Law, the 
Lanham Act and any applicable international laws or treaties. 
 
UrbanWars.net 
 
I, the undersigned, do solemnly and sincerely declare and CERTIFY UNDER 
PENALTY OF PERJURY that: 
 
1. I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner
of  
certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named
Urbanwars.net 
("IP Owner"). 
 
2. I have a good faith belief that the materials identified in the
addendum  
attached hereto are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or
the  
law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to the laws
of  
the (check all that apply): 
United States X 
Australia 
Brazil 
Canada  
EUR 
France 
Germany 
Italy 
Japan 
Netherlands  
Russia 
United Kingdom 
All of the above X 
 
Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or

items claimed to be infringing. 
 
3. I may be contacted at: 
Printed Name: Russell Mitchell 
Title: Owner 
Company: InterCage, Inc. 
Address: 200 Paul Ave. 
San Francisco, ca 94110 
 
Email (correspondence): Russ@InterCage.com 
 
You should understand that this letter constitutes notice to you that
the  
sale and/or other distribution of this content is unauthorized. This
letter 
does not constitute a waiver of any right to recover damages incurred by

virtue of any such unauthorized activities, and such rights as well as 
claims for other relief are expressly retained. 
 
Finally, notwithstanding our use of the required notice form, we believe

that pimpin4life.com's activities and services fall outside the scope of

the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"). Our use of this form, as

required by law, is meant to facilitate pimpin4life.com's removal of the

infringing product listed above and is not meant to suggest or imply
that  
pimpin4life.com's activities and services are within the scope of the
DMCA. 
 
I make this declaration conscientiously, believing it to be true and  
correct, and in accordance with the laws of each of the countries listed

above. I am aware and agree that the contents of this statement may be  
relied upon against me in any court or arbitration proceeding. 
 
Truthfully, 
Russell Mitchell 
 
Date: 29 April 2007 
 
http://pimpin4life.com 
 
================================================
